title: From Taylor Swift to Lizzo, here are the artists country duo Maddie & Tae listen to on repeat
text:
CLOSE

Maddie & Tae (Photo: The GreenRoom)

Currently touring with Carrie Underwood as part of her "Cry Pretty Tour 360" trek, country duo Maddie & Tae are celebrating their recent track release “Bathroom Floor” and prepping for their new EP "Everywhere I'm Goin'," out today.

To celebrate, the band's Maddie Marlow and Tae Dye curated a playlist of favorites for USA TODAY.

Maddie Marlow's picks:

"Cruel Summer," Taylor Swift

This melody is infectious. By far one of my favorite melodies I’ve heard from pop all year.

"Dream, Girl," Hailey Whitters

I listen to this song every day while I’m getting ready. This is my self-love anthem that gives me a boost of sunshine when I hear it.

“Bluebird," Miranda Lambert

This song is a warm cup of coffee in the morning swinging on a porch swing. It’s nostalgic and fresh at the same time and pulls on my heart strings.

"Good Bad & Ugly," Runaway June

This song reminds me of my sweet future husband and makes me giddy when I hear it. I see myself and my relationship in this song so clearly.

“Jerome,” Lizzo

I've been a die hard Lizzo fan for years and her vocal on this song just kills me. It’s so soulful and strong.

More: Lizzo, the flute-playing singer, is back in the studio with a 'really different' sound

Tae Dye's picks:

"Chasing You," Morgan Wallen

I love the way the hook of this song means different things. It gets stuck in my head all the time.

"Cool," Jonas Brothers

The Jonas Brothers were the first concert I ever went to and I am so glad they came back with new music.

More: The Jonas Brothers are even better now than they were 10 years ago

"Someone You Loved," Lewis Capaldi

My fiancé introduced me to this song and every time I hear it now I think of him.

"What Could’ve Been,” Gone West

I wish I wrote this!

"Liar," Camila Cabello

I am a fan of anything this girl does. The music video to this song is out of the box and I love it.

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/entertainment/music/2019/10/18/maddie-taes-favorite-songs/2443168001/
description: The country duo are on tour with Carrie Underwood and released a new EP "Everywhere I'm Goin'," Oct. 18.
